features: ✔️【New Upgrade -- Size Upgrade 】Length (24.8 "-35.4") x width 12.2 "x height 32.5", stable adjustable length :24.8 "-35.4". Carefully measure the size of the sink and the space above the cabinets before buying.

If your windowsill is less than 16.5 inches, you can remove the third-tier and install it as a second-tier. If your windowsill cabinets are less than 21.5 inches, you can use a 2-tier sink rack. Sink racks can meet your kitchen cutlery rack storage needs in 3 ways.

✔️【New Upgrade -- Style Upgrade 】Upgraded 3-tiers drying rack with hardened iron, upgraded height and adjustable length to fit most kitchen sinks. With a loading capacity of over 80 pounds, you can put all your kitchen supplies on this dish rack!
✔️【New Upgrade -- accessories upgrade 】6 baskets in total!! 1 plate holder, 3 large cutlery holders, 1 small cutlery holder, 1 sponge holder, 1 cutting board holder, 1 cup holder, 1 knife holder.

✔️【New Upgrade -- Material Upgrade 】Iron black coating material, not easy to rust, durable, easy to clean. Attached with the installation instructions and screws and other accessories to use, easy installation. All parts are adjustable and detachable to suit your needs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Space-Saver at an Excellent Value
reviews.reviewText: Before I bought this over-the-sink drying rack, a large portion of my kitchen countertop space was occupied by a bulky drying tub that couldn't hold many dishes. When I saw this rack for under $30, I figured I'd give it a try, because at worst, I could just combine it with my tub and dry more dishes at once.Assembly of this unit is very easy, and it comes with the screwdriver and spare screws, nuts, and washers in case you strip or round out a couple during assembly. In all, I needed about ten minutes to put it together, and the easy-to-read instructions made it a cinch.The unit itself sticks well to my non-textured countertop, and its adjustable width allows it to fit over narrow, standard, or double sinks. Its three racks hold a surprising amount of weight without bending or toppling the unit, as its center of gravity is on the rear legs and weight is spread to the front legs if the largest of the racks is filled up. I've fit about twenty-five pounds of dishes, pots, and pans onto the rack at once, and that should be enough even for an average-sized household and their daily dirty dishes.Overall, I'm very happy with my purchase, as it has saved me valuable counter space in my small kitchen, and cleaning the drying rack has only ever required a quick rub with a damp cloth and some dish soap. With the rack designed to drain dishes directly into the sink via gravity, my dishes also dry much more quickly than they did in my tub. This rack is a great value, especially if your kitchen space is at a premium.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It is sturdy and well worth the price. Easy to put together and space saving.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Been using it for about a month now, the product isn’t bad at all. But one small thing is, it is small for blows and large dishes. Other than that it is good overall

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A great product
reviews.reviewText: Arrived on time and in excellent condition. Fast easy assembly. The adjustable width worked great for fitting it into my space and the ability to configure the baskets as i please makes for a wonderful customized look. Stong and durable construction promises a long term solution in the kitchen .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Takes very little space
reviews.reviewText: This is great and gave me my much needed counter space back! I have a small kitchen and I love the look and the sturdiness. It holds all of my dishes without any problem.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I had initially bought the two tier thinking the three tier would dominate the space but the two tier ended up looking wonky and out of place. Opting for the three tier helped fill the space as well as clear up so much counter room! I have counter space back I haven’t been able to use since owning the house because there’s not constantly a dish rack there! Easily assembled and the modular shelf options are great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Saves Counter Space!
reviews.reviewText: I love how this dish rack sits over the sink so the water drips into the sink instead of dealing with a tray under the dish rack. Most importantly, it saves precious counter space. It was easy to set up and it feels pretty sturdy. My dish rack arrived missing a plastic cap on the top of one of the posts but I didn't notice until I had assembled it so I didn't return it. The missing piece doesn't affect the function of the product but I hope it doesn't cause the metal to rust more easily to have the end of the post exposed to water. Overall, I'm very happy with this dish rack.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cheap but works and does the job
reviews.reviewText: Works great for what it is, Metal is a little thin so some of the parts may come slightly bent but they’re easily bent back. Personally I use it for plastic plates so I’m not worried about the weight. If you use heavy glass plates I could see the metal thickness being an issue. Building was also super easy although the parts do not have letters on them you have to identify them using the pictures provided. Suction cups also dont really press down unless you have weight on the rack either so it does slide a little if you do not have anything on it. Overall I do still like it!
